Selected Answer: AB
Options C and D are not directly related to addressing call abandonment rates:
C. Setting up Email-to-Case is about managing email inquiries as cases and may not directly impact call abandonment rates.
D. Adding additional agents may help with average hold time but doesn't directly address call abandonment rates. Call abandonment typically occurs when callers hang up before reaching an agent, and the reasons for this can be related to IVR complexity or routing issues.

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers is looking for ways to provide more proactive support and to promote its brand on the internet with minimal investment. A consultant recommends installing the Social Customer Service Start Pack.
Which two features should the consultant recommend as part of the deployment? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
The correct answers are:

B. Create and assign permission sets to give agents social account access.
C. Add two Twitter or Facebook accounts.

Explanation:
B. Create and assign permission sets to give agents social account access:

Permission sets are necessary to grant agents access to social media accounts and manage social interactions. This allows agents to interact with customers and create cases directly from social posts.
C. Add two Twitter or Facebook accounts:

The Social Customer Service Starter Pack allows integration with up to two social media accounts (e.g., Twitter or Facebook) for monitoring and interacting with customers. This is a key feature for promoting the brand and providing proactive support.
